tagline: Edge intelligence for compliant NPHIES journeys
eligibility_intro: Submit real-time eligibility requests against the NPHIES Taameen APIs.
eligibility_result_hint: Copy the response into your EMR or launch the claim builder to continue the workflow.
enter_hint: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for a new line
assistant_welcome: Hi! I can help you orchestrate eligibility, claim, and payment workflows across NPHIES. Ask a question, tap a shortcut, or open the structured insight to copy JSON payloads.
assistant_mode_expressive_hint: More narrative guidance with expanded commentary
chat_error: The assistant ran into an issue. Please try again.
prompt_eligibility_prompt: Generate an eligibility check payload for patient 1234567890 with coverage COV-001 for physiotherapy session code 103693007.
prompt_claim_prompt: Create a professional claim for patient 1234567890, claim CLM-001, ICD-10 code J10.1, amount 250 SAR with required NPHIES fields.
prompt_audit_prompt: Summarise recent eligibility and claim decisions for the last outpatient visit and highlight missing evidence.
dashboard_intro: Monitor flows, jump into forms, and coordinate with the edge copilot.
error: Sorry, I could not understand that request.
consent_notice: By continuing you confirm patient consent to access NPHIES data.
copilot_tip_body: Store your mutual TLS certificate as a Cloudflare Worker secret and connect via Zero Trust Access to keep NPHIES identifiers safe.
shortcut_eligibility_desc: Validate a patient and coverage instantly.
shortcut_chat_desc: Send a smart prompt with all identifiers.
start_chat: Ask the assistant anything about NPHIES
claim_intro: Register reimbursement claims through the secure edge worker.
claim_result_hint: Review the adjudication outcome and upload supporting evidence if requested.
pwa_update_description: A new version of NPHIES Assistant is ready to install.
pwa_install_description: Add NPHIES Assistant to your home screen for quick access.
pwa_offline_mode: You're offline. Some features may be limited.
